data.title: Billionaire founder of Corona beer makes entire Spanish village millionaires in his will

47 of the world's poorest countries are aiming to hit 100% renewable energy - "The idea is ... to skip from pre-industrialisation to renewables, avoiding the 'messy part' in the middle where a need for more energy to support economic growth spurs fossil fuel use to dangerously high levels."

Israel thanks Turkey for its offer to help extinguish fire- Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has accepted the Turkish government's offer to provide assistance in extinguishing country-wide bush fires, and thanked Turkey, reports said on Thursday.
